data.text: O God, save me,
I continue to sink in the deep mud,
I am exhausted from calling out for help;
Those who hate me when there is no reason to hate me
O God, ◄you see the sins that I have committed/my sins are not hidden from you►.
O Yahweh God, you who are the commander of the armies of heaven,
People have insulted/ridiculed me because I am devoted to you.
Even my own older brothers act as if they do not know me;
Some people have despised your temple;
When I have humbled myself and ◄fasted/abstained from eating food►
When I put on rough sackcloth to show that I am sad,
Even the elders of the city say bad things about me.
But Yahweh, I will continue praying to you.
Do not allow me to sink any more in the mud.
Do not allow flood waters to swirl around me,
O Yahweh, answer my prayer and help me
Do not ◄hide yourself from/refuse to hear► me;
Come near to me and save me;
You know that I am insulted
Their insults have deeply offended me,
Instead, they gave me food that tasted like poison,
I hope/desire that the feasts [MTY] that they enjoy will ◄become a snare for/bring trouble to► them,
I hope/desire that their eyesight will become dim so that they cannot see anything,
Show them that you are very angry with them!
Cause their towns to become abandoned/deserted
Do this because they persecute those whom you have punished,
Keep making a record of all their sins,
Erase their names [SYN] from the book containing the names of those who have eternal life;
As for me, I have pain and am suffering.
When God does that, I will sing as I praise God,
My doing that will please Yahweh more than sacrificing oxen,
Oppressed/Afflicted people will see that God has rescued me,
Yahweh listens to those who are needy;
I desire that everything will praise God—
God will rescue the people of Jerusalem from their enemies,
The descendants of his people will inherit it,
